overview: Corpusse: Surrender to the Passion is a documentary about Corpusse, his life, art and philosophy; an occasionally shocking and unexpectedly touching portrait. With footage of Corpusse’s riveting live shows and interviews with collaborators, friends, fans and the secretive Corpusse himself, the film tells the story of one of Canada’s most unique and under-appreciated artists.
title: Corpusse: Surrender to the Passion
